message:
In this case, you're talking about asynchronous data loading, which is different. Check out these articles for some suggestions:  
 [http://blog.stephencleary.c...](http://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/01/async-oop-3-properties.html "http://blog.stephencleary.com/2013/01/async-oop-3-properties.html")
